thread.title: Asmir Begovic: This is what Antonio Conte thinks of Jose Mourinho
thread.title_full: Asmir Begovic: This is what Antonio Conte thinks of Jose Mourinho

title: Asmir Begovic: This is what Antonio Conte thinks of Jose Mourinho
text:
Asmir Begovic: This is what Antonio Conte thinks of Jose Mourinho ASMIR BEGOVIC has suggested Antonio Conte and Jose Mourinho's dislike for each other goes beyond last week's touchline spat. PUBLISHED: 22:44, Mon, Mar 20, 2017 | UPDATED: 22:50, Mon, Mar 20, 2017 GETTY Jose Mourinho and Antonio Conte squared up to each other in the FA Cup 
Jose Mourinho and Antonio Conte had to be separated by the fourth official in last week's FA Cup clash between Manchester United and Chelsea. 
The Blues ran out 1-0 winners in a heated encounter at Stamford Bridge which also saw Ander Herrera sent off. 
And goalkeeper Asmir Begovic has admitted it was brilliant to watch from the dugout, revealing Conte is not a fan of Mourinho's. 
"It was a huge occasion, a huge game at the Bridge," Begovic said. GETTY Asmir Begovic enjoyed watching the two managers scrap from the dugout 
"As disappointed as I was at not playing in the game, what I did have was first row seats to what was some amusing sideline antics, 
"The two managers going at it, yelling at each other, it was a very intense match. 
"It was really unnecessary, but it was so funny, because I was trying so hard not to laugh. Antonio Conte's crazy celebration after Gary Cahill's winner against Stoke Sat, March 18, 2017 Antonio Conte went a little bit mad after Gary Cahill's winner against Stoke City at the bet365 Stadium, and the home side won't be too pleased with the Chelsea manager
